evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs bring this Complaint against the U.S. Department of Homeland Security and the United States of America, and, in her official capacity, Kristi Noem, and state as follows.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Individual, described as Susan Webber and Jonathan St. Goddard, enrolled members of the Blackfeet Nation.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Attorneys for Plaintiffs Susan Webber and Jonathan St. Goddard

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Private Counsel (Monica J. Tranel, Tranel Law Firm, P.C.)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Susan Webber is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and an elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Susan Webber, enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Jonathan St. Goddard is a rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates a family place south of Browning.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Jonathan St. Goddard, rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates a family place south of Browning.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Kristi Noem is the Secretary of the United States Department of Homeland Security and that agency’s highest ranking official.

extracted.value: Defendant: Kristi Noem, Secretary of the United States Department of Homeland Security.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States Department of Homeland Security is a cabinet agency within the executive branch of the United States government.

extracted.value: Defendant: United States Department of Homeland Security, a cabinet agency within the executive branch of the United States government.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States of America is responsible for the exercise of the executive action by the named Defendants and all other agencies.
